## Current Teaching

#### Principles of Microeconomics

This course, taught in Czech, introduces first-year Faculty of Economics students at Masaryk University to the principles of microeconomics, based on Mankiw's *Principles of Economics*. For more information, please visit the course [website](https://is.muni.cz/el/econ/podzim2024/BPE_MIE1/index-XuHfzb.qwarp).


\

#### Applied Identification Strategies

Applied Identification Strategies, co-taught with [Štěpán Mikula](https://sites.google.com/site/stepanmikula/), introduces students to the principles of causal inference using Huntington-Klein's [*The Effect*](https://theeffectbook.net/) as a core text. For more information, please visit the course [website](https://is.muni.cz/auth/el/econ/jaro2025/MPE_APIS/index.qwarp).


\

#### Analysis and Visualization of Economic Data in R

Students will learn the basics of data analysis and visualization in R through this Czech-language course, co-taught by [Štěpán Mikula](https://sites.google.com/site/stepanmikula/). We use a custom [textbook](https://aved.econ.muni.cz/) developed specifically for this course. Visit the course [website](https://is.muni.cz/auth/el/econ/podzim2024/MPE_AVED/index.qwarp) for more details.
